code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[students,setStudents]=useState([]);const[name,setName]=useState('');const[age,setAge]=useState('');const[major,setMajor]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(name&&age&&major){const newStudent={name,age,major};setStudents([...students,newStudent]);setName('');setAge('');setMajor('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Student Information System"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Developed By: 101447858 || Melina Behzadi Nejad || DevOps"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Age:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:age,onChange:e=>setAge(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Major:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:major,onChange:e=>setMajor(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Student"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Student List"}),students.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No students added yet"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:students.map((student,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[student.name," - Age: ",student.age,", Major: ",student.major]},index))})]});}export default App;
